description: This file defines the NoteDao class, a Data Access Object that encapsulates database operations for notes, including CRUD functions (create, read, update, delete) and querying with optional search functionality.

classes.name: NoteDao
classes.description: A class providing database operations for notes, including insertion, update, deletion, and retrieval, utilizing an SQLite database helper.

methods.name: insert
methods.description: Inserts a new note into the database and returns the new row ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by its ID, returning the number of rows affected.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID, returning the number of rows deleted.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, returning a Note object or null if not found.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves all notes, optionally filtering by a search query, ordered by last updated timestamp descending.

methods.name: cursorToNote
methods.description: Converts a Cursor positioned at a row into a Note object.
